mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_animal_insert AS i left JOIN tb_animal_disposal AS d ON i.animal_insert_code = d.animal_insert_code WHERE d.animal_disposal_code IS null
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_animal_insert SET animal_center_number=#{animalCenterNumber}, animal_picture=#{animalPicture}, animal_gender=#{animalGender}, animal_age=#{animalAge}, animal_weight=#{animalWeight}, animal_character=#{animalCharacter}, animal_state=#{animalState}, animal_type_code=#{animalType.animalTypeCode}, accept_code=#{reportManger.acceptCode} WHERE animal_insert_code=#{animalInsertCode}
mapper.select:
SELECT p.protect_space_code AS 'spaceCode'
FROM tb_animal_insert AS i JOIN tb_animal_type AS t ON i.animal_type_code = t.animal_type_code LEFT JOIN tb_protect_space AS p ON i.animal_insert_code = p.animal_insert_code
t.animal_type = #{send_type}
ORDER BY i.animal_insert_reg_date DESC
SELECT animal_type AS animalType, COUNT(*) AS cnt FROM tb_animal_insert AS i join tb_animal_type AS t ON i.animal_type_code = t.animal_type_code GROUP BY animal_type;

SELECT * FROM tb_animal_insert AS a left JOIN tb_animal_type AS t ON a.animal_type_code = t.animal_type_code left JOIN tb_staff AS s ON a.staff_code = s.staff_code left JOIN tb_report_manager AS r ON a.accept_code = r.accept_code WHERE animal_insert_code = #{animal_insert_code};

SELECT * FROM tb_search_report AS s JOIN tb_animal_type AS t ON s.animal_code = t.animal_type_code JOIN tb_member AS m ON m.member_id=s.member_id WHERE m.member_name = #{memberName} AND m.member_phone = #{memberPhone}
SELECT accept_code as acceptCode FROM tb_report_manager AS r JOIN tb_search_report AS s on r.report_code = s.search_report_code WHERE s.search_report_code = #{reCode}

SELECT s.search_report_code AS searchReportCode FROM tb_animal_insert AS a JOIN tb_report_manager AS r ON a.accept_code = r.accept_code JOIN tb_search_report AS s ON r.report_code = s.search_report_code WHERE a.animal_insert_code = #{send_code}

SELECT * FROM tb_animal_insert AS a left JOIN tb_report_manager AS r ON a.accept_code = r.accept_code JOIN tb_search_report AS s on r.report_code = s.search_report_code JOIN tb_member AS m ON s.member_id = m.member_id WHERE a.animal_insert_code = #{send_code};
